name: Ritual: Tactics
description:
The final year project I made for my university course. Development time ~8 months.

Three imperial couriers were ambushed by a strange cult on a detour through the uncharted forests of the south. Escape the cultist's dungeon, retrieve the sacred documents, and stop the ritual before it's too late!
